spade.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a tool for digging that has a long handle and a broad metal blade that you push into the ground
spade.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a playing card belonging to the set of cards that have one or more black shapes that look like pointed leaves printed on them
spade.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a very offensive word for a black person. Do not use this word.
